imdb.title: Nourin
imdb.plot: A farm boy named Kousaka Hata meets his famous platonic love when Yuka Kusakabe retires and moves to his agriculture school.

episodes.title: Chuno Love Story
episodes.plot: Kousaku dreams of being with the popstar Yukatan. His friends don't understand his obsession. Kousaku learns that Yukatan is retiring from singing. But then, a new girl who looks like Yukatan has enrolled at his school...

episodes.title: The King of Farmers
episodes.plot: Kousaku tries to introduce Ringo (former popstar Yukatan) to his school and to farming. However, everything comes to a standstill when a debate starts about the value of panties...

episodes.title: Super Sub-Mom War: Training Stage
episodes.plot: Minori tries to embarrass Ringo in a series of farming challenges in order to send her packing back to Tokyo.

episodes.title: The Smile You Showed Me
episodes.plot: When one of the school's fields is trashed by a wild monkey, the students have to agree on the best counterattack--but some of their ideas seem a little questionable.

episodes.title: Farming's Five Top Four
episodes.plot: An unexpected shortage of miso results in a series of bizarre encounters with some of the more unusual members of the school's student body.

episodes.title: Full-Moe Alchemist: Bounty
episodes.plot: A grand plan to jump on the "moe foods" bandwagon goes in ever-crazier directions, egged on by another of Farming's Top Four.

episodes.title: Sob Salad
episodes.plot: The students cope (twice) with too much of a good thing, and a secret is revealed that could have dire consequences for Kousaku and Ringo.

episodes.title: Cooking Granny
episodes.plot: Kousaku's class experiences what he claims is a typical school day, despite Ms. Becky's best efforts to make her teaching style anything but normal.

episodes.title: School Swim Trunks
episodes.plot: A big summer storm threatens the gang's planned lazy day at the beach, but soon it's clear that's not the only thing in danger.

episodes.title: Veggie Battle: Ultimate v. Supreme
episodes.plot: Rei stakes his agricultural future on his organic, pesticide free veggies in a showdown against a farming megacorporation.

episodes.title: Cheerful Farming Village
episodes.plot: Minori brings Kousaku and Ringo back to the countryside where she and Kousaku grew up, but she has more than a simple visit on her mind.

episodes.title: Everybody's No-Rin
episodes.plot: The Aioi Village Mixer starts off on the right foot, but when the event's grand finale rolls around, will Kousaku and Minori hold up their end of the bargain?
